mapper.select: SELECT COMP_CODE AS DEPARTMENT_ID, EMP_NO AS EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, USE_YN AS USE_YN FROM SECWFM.WF_USERMASTER WHERE COMP_CODE IN ('TCKSF', 'UBSSF')
SELECT PERSONAL_AGENCY_CODE AS DEPARTMENT_ID, EMP_NO AS EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, USE_YN AS USE_YN FROM SECWFM.WF_USERMASTER WHERE PERSONAL_AGENCY_CODE LIKE 'EDU%'
SELECT PERSONAL_AGENCY_CODE AS DEPARTMENT_ID, EMP_NO AS EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, USE_YN AS USE_YN FROM SECWFM.WF_USERMASTER WHERE PERSONAL_AGENCY_CODE = '99N05'
